package.name: HTTP_Download
package.description: Provides an easy interface to send hidden files or any arbitrary data to the client over HTTP. It features HTTP Caching, Compression and Ranges (partial downloads and resuming).

release.notes: * Fixed HTTP range support (not completely HTTP compliant) * Fixed bug where wrong 'Content-Length' header was sent if download gets gzipped * Suppress warning if sessions are used and download gets gzipped
